headline: Reassessing Workday (WDAY) After A 40% One Year Share Price Decline
summary: If you are wondering whether Workday's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, this article will walk through what the numbers really say about value. Workday shares last closed at US$162.92, with returns of 7.2% decline over 7 days, 22.8% decline over 30 days, 20.8% decline year to date, 40.1% decline over 1 year, 12.8% decline over 3 years, and 42.1% decline over 5 years, which may have changed how some investors think about its potential and risk.
